name: parch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to dry something out because of too much heat and not enough rain: The fierce sun parched the soil.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
to lose moisture and become drydryIt will take three hours for the paint to dry.dehydrateToo much coffee will dehydrate you.desiccatePlant pests will desiccate in dry air.dry (something) outIf you don't put the cake back in the cake tin, it will dry out.dry upThe lake dried up during the drought.parchThey will turn off the irrigation and parch the crops right before harvest.
